languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, простите за беспокойство..." {n}Вигдис делает паузу, словно прислушивается к чему-то.{/n} "За вратами мостика какое-то столпотворение — кажется, один из офицеров требует аудиенции лично с вами. Кажется, я слышу голос господина Версериана... в любом случае, я хотела вас предупредить: к вам гости".

traits.locale_text: "Лорд-капитан, простите за беспокойство..." {n}Вигдис делает паузу, словно прислушивается к чему-то.{/n} "За вратами мостика какое-то столпотворение — кажется, один из офицеров требует аудиенции лично с вами. Кажется, я слышу голос господина Версериана... в любом случае, я хотела вас предупредить: к вам гости".

languages.text: "Lord Captain, sorry to disturb you..." {n}Vigdis pauses, as if listening to something.{/n} "It's pandemonium outside the bridge gate — one of the officers seems to be demanding an audience with you in person. I think I hear Master Werserian's voice... in any case, I wanted to warn you in advance."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, простите за беспокойство..." {n}Вигдис делает паузу, словно прислушивается к чему-то.{/n} "За вратами мостика какое-то столпотворение — кажется, один из офицеров требует аудиенции лично с вами. Кажется, я слышу голос господина Версериана... в любом случае, я хотела вас предупредить: к вам гости".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, sorry to disturb you..." {n}Vigdis pauses, as if listening to something.{/n} "There's some pandemonium outside the bridge gate — one of the officers seems to be demanding an audience with you in person. I think I hear Master Werserian's voice... in any case, I wanted to warn you in advance."

"Lord Captain, sorry to disturb you..." {n}Vigdis pauses, as if listening to something.{/n} "It's pandemonium outside the bridge gate — one of the officers seems to be demanding an audience with you in person. I think I hear Master Werserian's voice... in any case, I wanted to warn you in advance."

"Lord Captain, sorry to disturb you..." {n}Vigdis pauses, as if listening to something.{/n} "It's pandemonium outside the bridge gate — one of the officers seems to be demanding an audience with you in person. I think I hear Master Werserian's voice... in any case, I wanted to warn you in advance."

"Lord Captain, sorry to disturb you..." {n}Vigdis pauses, as if listening to something.{/n} "It's pandemonium outside the bridge gate — one of the officers seems to be demanding an audience with you in person. I think I hear Master Werserian's voice... in any case, I wanted to warn you in advance."

languages.text: « Pardonnez-moi de vous déranger, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}... » {n}Vigdis marque une pause, comme si elle écoutait quelque chose en arrière-plan.{/n} « Il y a du grabuge à la porte de la passerelle, c'est le chaos... Apparemment, l'un des officiers exige une audience personnelle avec vous. Je crois avoir reconnu la voix de maître Werserian... Quoi qu'il en soit, j'ai jugé utile de vous prévenir. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, sorry to disturb you..." {n}Vigdis pauses, as if listening to something.{/n} "It's pandemonium outside the bridge gate — one of the officers seems to be demanding an audience with you in person. I think I hear Master Werserian's voice... in any case, I wanted to warn you in advance."

traits.locale_text: « Pardonnez-moi de vous déranger, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}... » {n}Vigdis marque une pause, comme si elle écoutait quelque chose en arrière-plan.{/n} « Il y a du grabuge à la porte de la passerelle, c'est le chaos... Apparemment, l'un des officiers exige une audience personnelle avec vous. Je crois avoir reconnu la voix de maître Werserian... Quoi qu'il en soit, j'ai jugé utile de vous prévenir. »

languages.text: “舰长大人，很抱歉打扰您……”{n}维格迪斯停顿了一下，似乎在倾听什么。{/n}“舰桥门外一片混乱，有位军官似乎想亲自见您一面。我好像听到了韦尔森大师的声音……总之，我想提前提醒您一下。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, sorry to disturb you..." {n}Vigdis pauses, as if listening to something.{/n} "It's pandemonium outside the bridge gate — one of the officers seems to be demanding an audience with you in person. I think I hear Master Werserian's voice... in any case, I wanted to warn you in advance."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，很抱歉打扰您……”{n}维格迪斯停顿了一下，似乎在倾听什么。{/n}“舰桥门外一片混乱，有位军官似乎想亲自见您一面。我好像听到了韦尔森大师的声音……总之，我想提前提醒您一下。”

languages.text: "Lord Captain, verzeiht die Störung ..." {n}Vigdis hält inne, als würde sie auf etwas lauschen.{/n} "Vor dem Tor der Brücke herrscht Aufruhr. Einer der Offiziere verlangt offenbar eine persönliche Audienz bei Euch. Ich glaube, ich höre Meister Werserians Stimme ... wie dem auch sei, ich wollte Euch vorwarnen."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, sorry to disturb you..." {n}Vigdis pauses, as if listening to something.{/n} "It's pandemonium outside the bridge gate — one of the officers seems to be demanding an audience with you in person. I think I hear Master Werserian's voice... in any case, I wanted to warn you in advance."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, verzeiht die Störung ..." {n}Vigdis hält inne, als würde sie auf etwas lauschen.{/n} "Vor dem Tor der Brücke herrscht Aufruhr. Einer der Offiziere verlangt offenbar eine persönliche Audienz bei Euch. Ich glaube, ich höre Meister Werserians Stimme ... wie dem auch sei, ich wollte Euch vorwarnen."

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, perdone que {mf|lo|la} moleste...». {n}Vigdis hace una pausa como si estuviera escuchando algo.{/n} «Fuera es un completo caos y, por lo visto, uno de los oficiales quiere hablar con usted en persona. Creo que era la voz del maestro Werserian... Bueno, solo quería que estuviera avisad{mf|o|a}».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, sorry to disturb you..." {n}Vigdis pauses, as if listening to something.{/n} "It's pandemonium outside the bridge gate — one of the officers seems to be demanding an audience with you in person. I think I hear Master Werserian's voice... in any case, I wanted to warn you in advance."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, perdone que {mf|lo|la} moleste...». {n}Vigdis hace una pausa como si estuviera escuchando algo.{/n} «Fuera es un completo caos y, por lo visto, uno de los oficiales quiere hablar con usted en persona. Creo que era la voz del maestro Werserian... Bueno, solo quería que estuviera avisad{mf|o|a}».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、お忙しいところ失礼します…」{n}ヴィグディスは何かを耳にしたように、一瞬動きを止める。{/n}「ブリッジの門の外は大混乱です。士官のひとりが陛下直々のご謁見を求めています。マスター・ウェルザリアンの声が聞こえたような…いずれにせよ、先にお知らせせねばと思いました」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, sorry to disturb you..." {n}Vigdis pauses, as if listening to something.{/n} "It's pandemonium outside the bridge gate — one of the officers seems to be demanding an audience with you in person. I think I hear Master Werserian's voice... in any case, I wanted to warn you in advance."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、お忙しいところ失礼します…」{n}ヴィグディスは何かを耳にしたように、一瞬動きを止める。{/n}「ブリッジの門の外は大混乱です。士官のひとりが陛下直々のご謁見を求めています。マスター・ウェルザリアンの声が聞こえたような…いずれにせよ、先にお知らせせねばと思いました」

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, rahatsız ettiğim için af buyurun..." {n}Vigdis, bir şeyler dinler gibi duraksıyor.{/n} "Köprü kapısının önünde hengâme çıkmış. Subaylardan biri sizinle yüz yüze görüşmeyi talep ediyormuş. Üstat Werserian'ın sesini duyuyorum sanki... Neyse, önceden haber vermek istedim sadece."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, sorry to disturb you..." {n}Vigdis pauses, as if listening to something.{/n} "It's pandemonium outside the bridge gate — one of the officers seems to be demanding an audience with you in person. I think I hear Master Werserian's voice... in any case, I wanted to warn you in advance."
